channel.title: How do i make items auto appear on the ground?
channel.description: i am wanting some rune pickaxes to spawn on the ground so people can mine with them how do i do this where do i go to?

item.title: How do i make items auto appear on the ground?
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

itemspawnpoint or item handler

add this with others

ItemHandler.addItem(X, Y, Item ID, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Rune picaxe

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make items auto appear on the ground?
